      • getSuspendableWorkItems

        protected java.util.Set<WorkItemRecord> getSuspendableWorkItems(java.lang.String scope,
                                                                java.lang.String id)
        Retrieves a list of 'suspendable' workitems (ie. enabled, fired or executing) for a specified scope.
        Parameters:
        scope - - either case (all items in a case) or spec (all items in all case instances of that specification) or task (all workitem instances of that task)
        id - - the id of the case/spec/task
        Returns:
        a list of the requested workitems

      • getSuspendableWorkItemsInChain

                                                                       java.lang.String caseID)

        Returns:
